Title: Of Mice and Lem
Plot: To the dismay of his friends, a weary Lem is thinking about accepting a deal from the D.A. where he has to plead guilty to the heroin charges.  With no other choice, Vic reluctantly meets with Antwon in order to ensure Lem?s safety in prison.  Meanwhile, unforeseen circumstances that are beyond Claudette and Dutch?s control might cause irrevocable damage to their friendship.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
